text: Palipose pachim'be chiwa chichimpatepe, atamose n'di m’makome geliye mwa kunyang'amasya, naga umbone uli wapatile (achimakafili ni achinakunaku) akasatiji: “Walakweu ukumila kwa Allah.” Nambo naga chapatile chakusakala ni akasatiji: “Chalakwechi chikuumila kukwenu (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ). Jilani: “Yosope ikuumila kwa Allah (mu lisosa Lyakwe).” Ana kwa ŵele ŵanduŵa chipali chichi chikwatendekasya kuti alepele kupikanichisya abali (jilijose)
